Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a leadoff laser beam for a 1-0 lead
Ohtani walked three times in the game
Teoscar Hern√°ndez walked twice in the game
Freddie Freeman rested his ailing right ankle
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers had a plan to not give in to the nibble against Mets starter Jose Quintana
The Dodgers focused on not chasing pitches outside the zone during the regular season
Post-Match Reflections: Mets manager Carlos Mendoza praised the Dodgers' deep lineup and discipline
Chris Taylor mentioned the need for a different focus in the postseason
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets' pitchers issued 31 walks in the first four games of the NLCS
The Dodgers' four consecutive postseason games with at least seven walks set a record
This is the first time in 72 years a team has walked at least seven batters in four consecutive postseason games
